mapper.sql: ROLE_ID, ROLE_CODE, ROLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, ISREVIEW, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_OPERATOR, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3, REMARK4, REMARK5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOP_ROLEINFO ( ROLE_ID, ROLE_CODE, ROLE_NAME, DESCRIPTION, ISREVIEW, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_OPERATOR, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3, REMARK4, REMARK5 )VALUES ( #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isreview,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update TOP_ROLEINFO set ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ISREVIEW = #{isreview,jdbcType=CHAR} , STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UPDATE_OPERATOR = #{updateOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK4 = #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , REMARK5 = #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
